definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: In 1970, unbeknownst to her son Yuan Liu, Guangmei Wang was serving her time in Qincheng Prison.
sentences.chinese: 1970年，王光美在秦城服刑，兒子劉源不知道。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mental health state of female criminals.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查女性服刑人員心理健康。

sentences.english: North Korea says an American citizen sentenced to 15 years of hard labor has begun serving his sentence.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮說，被判15年勞教的一名美國公民開始服刑。

sentences.english: The judge gave Sutherland until March 30 to complete his jail term.
sentences.chinese: 法官要求薩瑟蘭在明年3月30日前完成服刑。

sentences.english: A second tunnel branched off to the criminal side of the prison, according to the warden, Gen. Ghulam Dastagir Mayar, and Mr. Wesa.
sentences.chinese: 地道的另一個分支通到了另一邊服刑犯的牢房。

sentences.english: Lazarenko is currently serving in the U. S. for money laundering.
sentences.chinese: 拉扎連科目前在美國因洗錢罪服刑。

sentences.english: Russian media speculated that they were being debriefed at Russian intelligence headquarters in Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 後四人均因向西方國家傳遞敏感信息而在俄羅斯服刑。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen, who has been expelled from the Communist Party, has yet to go on trial for the charges against him.
sentences.chinese: 陳良玉已被開除黨籍，但還沒有正式定罪服刑。

sentences.english: He was released from prison after serving a sentence of five years.
sentences.chinese: 他在服刑五年後從獄中釋放出來。

sentences.english: Just have a spotless record for the last 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 要有30年沒有污點的服刑檔案。

sentences.english: He was sentenced to five years, but should serve only three with remission.
sentences.chinese: 他被判了五年徒刑，但減刑後僅服刑三年。

sentences.english: Mr Zhang, alas, is serving an 18-year prison sentence for bribery.
sentences.chinese: 而張此時正在監獄因行賄而服刑18年。

sentences.english: Conclusion The work of psycho-education for prisoners should be highly emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 結論應加強服刑人員的心理健康教育工作。

sentences.english: The convict was pardoned after serving five years of his sentence.
A year into his sentence, Kyp's parents were killed in a prison revolt.
sentences.chinese: 服刑一年後，基普的父母死於一次監獄暴動。

sentences.english: Chinese prisons scrap ban on inmate homosexuality.
sentences.chinese: 中國不再明文禁止監獄服刑人員同性戀。

definition: to reduce penalty/shortened or commuted (judicial) sentence
to go to jail/to be sent to prison
to release for medical treatment (of a prisoner)
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
